name: Slippery Sheep
description:
You are a shepherd and you must stop the sheep and lambs from running off and getting eaten by wolves. Keep things together before the time runs out!

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam. The theme was out of control. The way our game fits the theme is that thing get really crazy and out of control when you have to catch sheep and scare off wolves.

Controls:

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.
  • RUN INTO the sheep to stop them from running away
  • RUN INTO the wolves to scare them away
  • PUSH sheep to move them
